description.narrative:
Output (s):Jobs created for young men and women Indicator (s): Total sustainable jobs for young men Total sustainable jobs for young women Target(s):
Output (s): Businesses established by young men and women in selected sectors Indicator (s):Total start-ups by young men Total start-ups by young women Target(s):
Output (s): SMEs expanded in selected sectors. Indicator (s): Total SMEs expanded Target(s):
Output (s): Young men and women willing to start a business Indicator (s):Percentage increase in interest of young men to start a business (perception research vs. baseline) Percentage increase in interest of young women to start a business (perception research vs. baseline) Target(s):

The activities are intended primarily for established entrepreneurs with problems of financing access to liquidity reinjection or market access. Secondly, activties are aimed to young entrepreneurs having obstacles to launch their projects and also educated job seekers to find sustainable jobs .

The governorate of Kef is an agricultural region with a great contribution to country. The region has contributed by 13% and 7% of the national production of cereals and red meats respectively, (according to the tunisian office of the northwest development) The agri-food sector has a huge potential in the region by the transformation some strategic products. The governorate of Kef also has archaeological heritage. This could be an asset for cultural, sustainable and ecological tourism
The economy of Kairouan is primarily based on agriculture, cultural tourism, industry and handicrafts Tourism has made an impact on Kairouan region since it was declared a world heritage site by the UCESCO in 1988. (according to the tunisian office of the centerwest development)
Despite all this, the kef and Kairouan regions are characterized by an unemployment rate relatively High. Young people in these deprived areas are opting for illegal migration and are more tempted by religious radicalization. This is why entrepreneurship is the optimal solution for these young people to limit unemployment and create value in these areas.
In this context, we can identify multiple opportunities that could lead to profitable and suitable projects for young people and future entrepreneurs in those two regions. The main impact would be to reduce: the unemployment rate, the low entrepreneurial intention, economic migration and religious radicalization of young people.

mailing-address.narrative: Institut Arabe des Chefs d'Entreprise (IACE) 4 Bvd. Rue du Lac Turkana 4 1053 Les Berges du Lac 1053 TUNIS Tunesië
